entity.name: model
entity.attribute: The document root element tag name. Default is 'model'.
Source directory to place generated model classes.
The package name for generated model classes.
The package name for generated transform classes. Optional, default is model-package plus '.transform'.
Whether to generate sample XML file or not. Default is true.
Whether to generate XML schema or not. Default is false.
Whether merger feature is disabled or not. Default is false.
Whether to generate BaseVisitor class or not. Default is false.
Whether XML parser, maker and linker feature is disabled or not. Default is false.

entity.name: entity
entity.attribute: Name for generated class.
If it's the document root. Only one root is allowed in one model.
If all children under current entity should be parsed/rendered in order in sequence.
If this entity can contain dynamic attributes.

entity.name: attribute
entity.attribute: If it's one of attribute(s) used to identify the entity. If true, then it's required as well.
If the value could be null. For key='true' or required='true', it's false otherwise true by default.
If render as text of an element. Default is false.
If render this attribute or not. Default is true.
If this attribute is required or optional. Default is false.
If this attribute is read-only or writable. Default is false.
If value-type refers to an enum type. Default is false.

entity.name: element
entity.attribute: If it's one of attribute(s) used to identify the entity. If true, then it's required as well.
If render this attribute or not. Default is true.
If this attribute is required or optional. Default is false.
If value-type refers to an enum type. Default is false.

entity.name: entity-ref
entity.attribute: If render XML elements in an indent hierarchy structure or flatten. Default is false. It will be false if enclosing entity with @all-children-in-sequence='true'
If this element is required or optional. Default is false.
